tossup_question: 30) MATH  While waiting at a train crossing, Gayle decided to time how long it took for a 1- mile long train to pass her directly. If it took exactly 75 seconds for the train to pass, at how many miles per hour was the train traveling?
bonus_question: 30) MATH  A right triangle with one angle of 45 degrees is inscribed in a circle of radius 10. What is the area of the triangle?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) 50 
X) 50 times the square root of 2 
Y) 100 
Z) 100 times the square root of 2
